name: Scraping
body:
scraping ========= _capture.py_ : takes screenshot of a given URL.
_getimages.py_ : download iamges from a link.
_pretty_scrape.py_ : prettify any URL
_Goodreads_ : Scraped goodreads quotes by two ways 1. Scraping all quotes page wise. 2. Scraped all quotes from rss feed of the user's liked quotes Then displayed a random quote from all the quotes.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
